rajya sewakayange saukhya prathilabha wadi kirime aramunin 2011 ayawayata yojana rasak idiripath kirimata jathika rakshana bhara aramudala thiranaya kara atha.ee anuwa rajya sewakayaku sandaha hruda sathkamakata methek gewu rupiyal laksha thuna hamaraka mudala laksha 5k dakwa wadi kirimatath hadisi anathurakadi gewana rupiyal laksha 6ka mudala laksha dahayak dakwa wadi kirimatath swabhawika maranayakadi laba dena rupiyal 50,000ka mudala lakshaya dakwa wadi kirimatath yojana kara thibe.mita amatharawa upas yuwala sandaha rajya sewakayanta laba dena rupiyal 3500ka mudala rupiyal 5000k dakwa wadi kirimatath eya wasara 5kata warak laba dimatath rakshana bhara aramudala yojana kara atha.siseriyan sathkamakadi laba dena rupiyal 40,000ka mudala rupiyal 50,000k dakwa wadi kirimatath, swabhawika daru upathakadi laba dena rupiyal 2500 rupiyal 10,000k dakwa wadi kirimatath jathika rakshana bhara aramudala thiranaya kara atha.rajya sewakayin sandaha jathika rakshana bhara aramudala kriyathmaka karana agrahara rakshana kramaya yatathe danata saukhya pahasukam sandaha gewanu labanne wasara gananawakata pera sammatha wu mudal bawath ada wana wita rajya sewakayanta saukhya pahasukam laba ganimata ema mudala pramanawath nowana bawath jathika rakshana bhara aramudale sabhapathi senaka abegunasekara mahatha pawasayi.mita amatharawa danata rupiyal 75k wana agrahara samajika mudala sulu pramanayakin wadi kirimata da yojana kala bawath ee mahatha pawasayi.

adhyapanaya athulu anekuth samaja saha pa්rajathanthriya ayithin aaraksha kala hakke dhanapathi aanduwata saha samastha dhanapathi ka්ramayata erehi deshapalana aragalayak thulin pamanak wana athara, ewan aragalayakata nayakathwaya dima sandaha aithihasikawa nirnaya wi athi panthiya kamkaru panthiya yi.

dawasak kenek mehema ahawawa gihi apit pansil rakinna kiwwata nitharama ape athin pansil kadenawa eekata mokada karanne kiyala.kadunoth nawathath pansil ganna.rakagena hitapu kalaya gana hithala sathutu wenna.kiyala uththara dunna.
